testcase.classname: As a user, I want to search for a product and proceed to checkout
testcase.name: Search for product and proceed to checkout
testcase.system-out: Given Launch amazon website.................................................passed When I search for product and select the first item.........................passed Then I add the product to cart and verify the price.........................passed When I click on proceed to checkout and login...............................passed Then I verify the price of the product on checkout page.....................passed
